Zill/N00487_A
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): All Homes - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_C
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Condominiums - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of condominiums within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_MVSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Value Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This number is derived by taking the estimated home value for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_1B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): One Bedroom Homes - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of one bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_2B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Two Bedroom Homes - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of two bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_BT
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Bottom Tier Homes - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of bottom tier homes within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. Bottom tier homes are the homes that fall into the bottom third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Rentals Median Price (All Homes) - Miami, FL

Zill/N00487_TT
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Top Tier Homes - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of top tier homes within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. Top tier homes are homes that fall into the top third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_RZSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Rentals ZRI Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals zri per sq. ft. (all homes) within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This is derived by taking the estimated rent price for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_MLPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median List Price per Sq. Ft. - Miami, FL
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median list price per sq. ft. within the neighborhood of Miami, FL. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_MSPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Sale Price per Sq. Ft. - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median sale price per sq. ft. within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_MPC
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Price Cut (%) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median price cut (%) within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_IV
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Increasing Values (%) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of increasing values (%) within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_DV
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Decreasing Values (%) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of decreasing values (%) within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_SPY
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Sold in the Past Year (%) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sold in the past year (%) within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00487_HR
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Homes for Rent (Beta) - Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami
This metric is currently in beta. The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes for rent (beta) within the neighborhood of Wynwood - Edgewater, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_SF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Single Family Residences - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of single family residences within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_MVSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Value Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This number is derived by taking the estimated home value for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_1B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): One Bedroom Homes - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of one bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_2B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Two Bedroom Homes - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of two bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_3B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Three Bedroom Homes - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of three bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_RMP
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Rentals Median Price (All Homes) - Miami, FL
Median of the rental price for homes listed for rent on Zillow within the neighborhood of Miami, FL. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_RAH
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Rentals All Homes - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals all homes within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_RZSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Rentals ZRI Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals zri per sq. ft. (all homes) within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This is derived by taking the estimated rent price for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_PRR
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Price-to-Rent Ratio - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of price-to-rent ratio within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_MSP
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Sale Price - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median sale price within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_MSPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Sale Price per Sq. Ft. - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median sale price per sq. ft. within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_IV
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Increasing Values (%) - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of increasing values (%) within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_DV
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Decreasing Values (%) - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of decreasing values (%) within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_SPY
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Sold in the Past Year (%) - Brickell, Miami
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sold in the past year (%) within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00332_HR
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Homes for Rent (Beta) - Brickell, Miami
This metric is currently in beta. The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes for rent (beta) within the neighborhood of Brickell, Miami. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_A
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): All Homes - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.



Zill/N00014_SF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Single Family Residences - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of single family residences within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.



Zill/N00014_C
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Condominiums - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of condominiums within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.
 
 
600000.0|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    *          *          *          *          *          * 550000.0|     *          *          *                                           *                                                                                                                        * 

Zill/N00014_MVSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median Value Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This number is derived by taking the estimated home value for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.



Zill/N00014_1B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): One Bedroom Homes - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of one bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_2B
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Two Bedroom Homes - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of two bedroom homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_BT
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Bottom Tier Homes - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of bottom tier homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. Bottom tier homes are the homes that fall into the bottom third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_MT
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Middle Tier Homes - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of middle tier homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. Middle tier homes are homes that fall into the middle third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.



Zill/N00014_TT
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Top Tier Homes - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of top tier homes within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. Top tier homes are homes that fall into the top third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_RZSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Rentals ZRI Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals zri per sq. ft. (all homes) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This is derived by taking the estimated rent price for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_MLPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Median List Price per Sq. Ft. - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median list price per sq. ft. within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_LPC
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Listings with Price Cuts (%) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of listings with price cuts (%) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_MLP

The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median list price within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_IV
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Increasing Values (%) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of increasing values (%) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_DV
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Decreasing Values (%) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of decreasing values (%) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_SFL
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Sold for Loss (%) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sold for loss (%) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

This metric is currently in beta. The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes for rent (beta) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_HF
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Homes Foreclosed (Out of 10k) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes foreclosed (out of 10k) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/N00014_FR
Zillow Home Value Index (Neighborhoods): Foreclosure Resales (%) - Hollywood, Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of foreclosure resales (%) within the neighborhood of Hollywood, Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_SF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Single Family Residences - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of single family residences within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_MVSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median Value Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the zip code of 90037, Los Angeles. This number is derived by taking the estimated home value for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_A
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): All Homes - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_3B
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Three Bedroom Homes - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of three bedroom homes within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_BT
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Bottom Tier Homes - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of bottom tier homes within the zip code of 90037. Bottom tier homes are the homes that fall into the bottom third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_MT
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Middle Tier Homes - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of middle tier homes within the zip code of 90037. Middle tier homes are homes that fall into the middle third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_RZSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Rentals ZRI Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals zri per sq. ft. (all homes) within the zip code of 90037. This is derived by taking the estimated rent price for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_MLPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median List Price per Sq. Ft. - Los Angeles
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median list price per sq. ft. within the zip code of Los Angeles. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_IV
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Increasing Values (%) - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of increasing values (%) within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Sold in the Past Year (%) - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sold in the past year (%) within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_HR
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Homes for Rent (Beta) - 90037
This metric is currently in beta. The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes for rent (beta) within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90037_HF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Homes Foreclosed (Out of 10k) - 90037
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes foreclosed (out of 10k) within the zip code of 90037. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_A
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): All Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_SF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Single Family Residences - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of single family residences within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_C
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Condominiums - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of condominiums within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_MVSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median Value Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of all homes within the zip code of 90210, Beverly Hills. This number is derived by taking the estimated home value for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_1B
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): One Bedroom Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of one bedroom homes within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_2B
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Two Bedroom Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of two bedroom homes within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_3B
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Three Bedroom Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of three bedroom homes within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_4B
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Four Bedroom Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of four bedroom homes within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_BT
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Bottom Tier Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of bottom tier homes within the zip code of 90210. Bottom tier homes are the homes that fall into the bottom third of home values within the region. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_RMP
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Rentals Median Price (All Homes) - Beverly Hills
Median of the rental price for homes listed for rent on Zillow within the zip code of Beverly Hills, CA. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_RAH
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Rentals All Homes - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals all homes within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_RZSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Rentals ZRI Per Sq. Ft. (All Homes) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of rentals zri per sq. ft. (all homes) within the zip code of 90210. This is derived by taking the estimated rent price for each home and dividing it by the homes square footage. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_PRR
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Price-to-Rent Ratio - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of price-to-rent ratio within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_MLP
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median List Price - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median list price within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median sale price within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_MLPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median List Price per Sq. Ft. - Beverly Hills
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median list price per sq. ft. within the zip code of Beverly Hills. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_MSPSF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median Sale Price per Sq. Ft. - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median sale price per sq. ft. within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_LPC
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Listings with Price Cuts (%) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of listings with price cuts (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_MPC
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Median Price Cut (%) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of median price cut (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_SLPR
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Sale-to-List Price Ratio - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sale-to-list price ratio within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_SFL
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Sold for Loss (%) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sold for loss (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_IV
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Increasing Values (%) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of increasing values (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_DV
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Decreasing Values (%) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of decreasing values (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_SPY
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Sold in the Past Year (%) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of sold in the past year (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_HR
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Homes for Rent (Beta) - 90210
This metric is currently in beta. The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes for rent (beta) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of foreclosure resales (%) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.

Zill/Z90210_HF
Zillow Home Value Index (ZIP): Homes Foreclosed (Out of 10k) - 90210
The Zillow Home Value Index is Zillow's estimate of the median market value of homes foreclosed (out of 10k) within the zip code of 90210. This data is calculated by Zillow Real Estate Research (www.zillow.com/research) using their database of 110 million homes.
